item.title: 韩国数十年来最严重空难：济州空难造成 120 多人死亡
item.description: 济州航空公司运营的一架波音 737-800 飞机在韩国机场跑道上坠毁并起火，造成 170 多人死亡或失踪。【原文：A Boeing Co. 737-800 aircraft operated by Jeju Air Co. crashed and caught fire on an airport runway in South Korea, resulting in more than 170 people dead or missing.】

item.title: 飞机在韩国机场坠毁，造成至少 23 人死亡：韩联社
item.description: 据韩联社周日报道，一架济州航空公司的飞机在韩国机场降落时偏离跑道，与一堵墙相撞，造成至少 23 人死亡。【原文：A Jeju Air plane landing at an airport in South Korea veered off the runway and collided with a wall, killing at least 23 people, Yonhap news agency reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国股利支付创历史新高加剧人民币压力
item.description: 中国雄心勃勃地重振疲软的股市，却意外地让人民币成为牺牲品，创纪录的股息派发导致资金外流。【原文：China’s ambitious campaign to revive its flagging stock market has made the yuan an unintended casualty, with record dividend payouts leading to outflows.】

item.title: Atos 称勒索软件组织声称其破坏了一个数据库
item.description: Atos SE称，一个名为Space Bears的勒索软件组织周六声称已经入侵了Atos的一个数据库。【原文：Atos SE said a ransomware group called Space Bears claimed on Saturday to have compromised an Atos database.】

item.title: N.朝鲜对美国采取 "最强应对战略"：韩联社
item.description: 韩国联合通讯社援引朝鲜国营新闻机构朝中社的报道称，朝鲜执政党对美国采取了 "最强硬的应对策略"。【原文：North Korea’s ruling party adopted “the strongest response strategy” toward the US, South Korean news agency Yonhap reported, citing North Korea’s state-run KCNA.】

item.title: AT&T 称 "盐台风 "黑客攻击后网络已恢复正常
item.description: AT&T 公司承认受到了与中国有关的 "Salt Typhoon "黑客行动的攻击，但其网络现已摆脱入侵。【原文：AT&T Inc. acknowledged that it had been hit by the China-linked Salt Typhoon hacking operation but that its networks were now clear from the intrusion.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克加倍支持德国极右翼政党 AfD
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克在《世界报》（Welt am Sonntag）发表的一篇评论文章中重申了他对极右翼德国选择党（AfD）的支持。【原文：Elon Musk reiterated his support for the far-right Alternative for Germany party, or AfD, in an opinion piece published by the Welt am Sonntag newspaper less than two months before Germans go to the polls.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司将因债务问题停止对摩尔多瓦的天然气供应
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）因涉嫌违反合同义务，将从莫斯科时间 1 月 1 日上午 8 点起停止向摩尔多瓦供应天然气。【原文：Russian Gazprom PJSC will stop supplies of natural gas to Moldova from 8am Moscow time on January 1 over alleged violation of contract obligations.】

item.title: 塞内加尔总统松科绕过议会通过 2025 年预算案
item.description: 塞内加尔总理奥斯曼-松科（Ousmane Sonko）绕过议会对 6.4 万亿非洲法郎（约合 102 亿美元）一揽子预算的表决，挥手通过了明年的预算。【原文：Senegal’s Prime Minister Ousmane Sonko waved through next year’s budget, bypassing a parliamentary vote on the 6.4 trillion CFA-franc ($10.2 billion) package.】

item.title: 银行希望分享 Tether 稳定币的数十亿美元利润
item.description: 直到最近，当稳定币市场的领头羊 Tether Holdings 以数十亿美元的利润为傲时，银行们还在一旁羡慕地看着。现在，他们想加入了。【原文：Until recently, banks watched from the sidelines with envy as stablecoin market leader Tether Holdings boasted of billions in profits. Now they want in.】

item.title: 据 Digi 报道，罗马尼亚将于 3 月 23 日重新举行总统选举
item.description: 据 Digi 24 援引不愿透露姓名的知情人士的话报道，罗马尼亚执政联盟同意按计划于 3 月 23 日重新举行总统选举，并于 4 月 6 日举行第二轮选举。【原文：Romania’s ruling coalition agreed to hold a planned rerun of the presidential elections on March 23 and a second round on April 6, Digi 24 reported, citing unidentified people with knowledge of the decision.】

item.title: 埃尔多安称 2025 年土耳其利率必将下降
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）表示，利率将在 2025 年下降，他再次表明了自己的非常规信念，即降低利率将减缓物价上涨。【原文：Turkey’s President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said interest rates will fall in 2025 as he once again stated his unconventional belief that lowering interest rates will slow down price increases.】

item.title: 对冲基金满载而归，银行业牛市将继续迅猛发展
item.description: 对于美国银行股来说，今年几乎是风光无限的一年。对于该行业许多最受尊敬的观察家来说，最好的还在后面。【原文：It’s been a banner year for US bank stocks by almost any measure. For many of the sector’s most respected observers, the best is yet to come.】

item.title: 意大利 2025 年预算获得议会批准，梅洛尼获得支持
item.description: 意大利议会在年底最后期限前几天为 2025 年预算案开了最后绿灯，总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）赢得了胜利。【原文：Italy’s parliament gave a final green light to the 2025 budget just days before a year-end deadline, in a win for Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni.】

item.title: 据 Corriere 报道，米兰机场网站遭黑客攻击
item.description: 据 Corriere della Sera 报道，米兰利纳特机场和马尔彭萨机场的网站在周六上午遭到网络攻击。【原文：The websites of Milan’s Linate and Malpensa airports were hit by a cyberattack on Saturday morning, Corriere della Sera reported.】

item.title: 中国敦促地方政府发放新年现金
item.description: 新华社援引民政部的通知报道称，中国中央政府敦促地方政府向生活困难的民众发放救济金。【原文：China’s central government urged local authorities to offer handouts to people struggling with the cost of living, Xinhua News Agency reported, citing a notice from the Ministry of Civil Affairs.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼告诉 Kurier，欧洲央行在下一次降息前可能会酝酿等待
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，如果能源价格带来的通胀风险或欧元贬值加剧成为现实，欧洲中央银行可能会考虑在下一次降息之前等待更长的时间。【原文：The European Central Bank could consider waiting longer before its next rate cut if inflation risks from energy prices or a stronger depreciation of the euro materialize, according to Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 乌克兰-俄罗斯天然气过境协议面临关键时刻
item.description: 乌克兰天然气过境的未来正处于转折点。如果不能在周三前达成最后一刻的协议，数十亿立方米的天然气运输可能会停止。【原文：The future of gas transit through Ukraine is at a turning point. If a last-minute deal isn’t struck by Wednesday, billions of cubic meters in gas flows could come to a halt.】

item.title: 新加坡石油大亨在帝国崩溃后宣布破产
item.description: 新加坡前大亨 Lim Oon Kuin 在其石油贸易帝国崩溃后被宣布破产。【原文：Former tycoon Lim Oon Kuin has been declared bankrupt in Singapore, following the collapse of his oil trading empire.】

item.title: 蓝色起源公司在首次发射前点燃新火箭引擎
item.description: 杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）的航空航天公司蓝色起源（Blue Origin）周五启动了其新型巨型火箭 "新格伦"（New Glenn）的发动机；这是最后一次关键测试，为火箭首次发射进入太空铺平了道路。【原文：Jeff Bezos’ aerospace firm Blue Origin fired up the engines on its massive new rocket, the New Glenn, on Friday — a last critical test needed to pave the way for the vehicle’s debut launch to space.】

item.title: 动量交易创纪录的一年即将结束，裂痕不断扩大
item.description: 尽管特朗普贸易得意洋洋，对人工智能歇斯底里，但在整个市场上赚钱却是艰难的一年。现在，就连推动美股上涨的贸易也开始出现动摇迹象。【原文：For all the Trump Trade triumphalism and hysteria for AI, it’s been a tough year to make money across markets. Now even the trade that powered US stocks is starting to show signs of wavering.】

item.title: 耶伦称财政部将在一月中旬达到新的债务限额
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，美国财政部很可能在 1 月中旬的某个时候开始采取特殊的会计手段，以避免突破美国的债务限额，并敦促立法者采取行动捍卫美国的 "完全诚信和信用"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said her department is likely to begin taking special accounting maneuvers sometime in mid-January to avoid breaching the US debt limit, and urged lawmakers to take action defending the “full faith and credit” of the US.】

item.title: 特朗普请求最高法院暂停威胁禁止 TikTok 的法律
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要求美国最高法院暂停执行一项法律，该法律规定，如果中国母公司不出售 TikTok 社交媒体平台，将于 1 月 19 日禁用该平台。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump asked the US Supreme Court to pause a law that would ban the TikTok social media platform on Jan. 19 if it isn’t sold by its Chinese parent company.】

item.title: TikTok 和拜登政府就美国禁令在最高法院发生争执
item.description: TikTok 和拜登政府就一项法律向美国最高法院摊牌，双方针锋相对，该法律将在下个月禁止这一流行的社交媒体应用程序，除非其中国母公司将其出售。【原文：TikTok and the Biden administration made dueling arguments to the US Supreme Court in their showdown over a law that would ban the popular social media app next month unless it’s sold by its Chinese parent company.】

item.title: 阿根廷本周因进口国美元需求支出 8.03 亿美元
item.description: 阿根廷央行本周出售了约 8.03 亿美元的硬通货储备，因为官员们急于满足进口商在一次重大债券支付之前对美元的激增需求。【原文：Argentina’s central bank sold some $803 million in hard-currency reserves this week after officials rushed to meet a surge in demand from importers for dollars ahead of a major bond payment.】

item.title: 拉皮丹称中东原油流动风险正在上升
item.description: 拉皮丹能源集团（Rapidan Energy Group）总裁鲍勃-麦克纳利（Bob McNally）说，人们越来越担心，中东地区新的紧张局势有可能削减重要的能源资源。【原文：There’s increasing concern that fresh tensions in the Middle East threaten to curtail vital energy resources, said Bob McNally, president of Rapidan Energy Group.】

item.title: 塞内加尔力争到 2027 年将预算赤字降至十年来最低水平
item.description: 塞内加尔总理奥斯曼-松科（Ousmane Sonko）表示，随着塞内加尔从明年起开始削减政府开支并想方设法提高税收，塞内加尔计划到2027年将预算赤字降至国内生产总值的3%。【原文：Senegal plans to slash its budget deficit to 3% of gross domestic product by 2027 as it begins cutting government expenditure and finds ways to boost tax collections from next year, Prime Minister Ousmane Sonko said.】

item.title: 格鲁吉亚梦幻亿万富翁伊万尼什维利遭美国制裁
item.description: 美国财政部制裁了格鲁吉亚亿万富翁比季纳-伊万尼什维利，他是 "格鲁吉亚之梦 "的创始人。【原文：The US Treasury sanctioned Georgian billionaire Bidzina Ivanishvili, the founder of Georgian Dream, the political party that has turned away from the West in favor of closer ties with Russia.】

item.title: 索拉纳先锋被前妻起诉，索要数百万加密货币回报
item.description: 全球最大的区块链平台之一索拉纳（Solana）公司的一名联合创始人正与他的前妻就一批利润丰厚的 SOL 代币的收益打官司。【原文：A co-founder of Solana, one of the biggest blockchain platforms in the world, is locked in a legal battle with his former wife over the gains from a cache of lucrative SOL tokens.】

item.title: 2024 年最佳电子游戏
item.description:
从庞大的开放世界 RPG 到独立扑克流氓游戏，以下是我们今年最喜爱的游戏

。【原文：

From sprawling open-world RPGs to indie poker rogue-likes, here are our favorite games of the year

】
